metadata.title: CVE-2023-1932 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in hibernate-validator's 'isValid' method in theorg.hibernate.validator.internal.constraintvalidators.hv.SafeHtmlValidatorclass, which can be bypassed by omitting the tag ending in a less-thancharacter. Browsers may render an invalid html, allowing HTML injection orCross-Site-Scripting (XSS) attacks.

criterions.comment: libhibernate-validator-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
